dcterms:creator: H. Xiao
K. Rasul
R. Vollgraf
dcterms:description: Fashion-MNIST is a dataset consisting of 70,000 grayscale images of clothing items, designed as a drop-in replacement for the MNIST dataset, with 10 different classes representing various types of clothing.
dcterms:title: Fashion-MNIST

dcterms:creator: S. Caldas
S. M. K. Duddu
P. Wu
T. Li
J. Konečný
H. B. McMahan
V. Smith
A. Talwalkar
dcterms:description: Federated Extended MNIST is an extension of the MNIST dataset for federated learning, containing handwritten digits and letters, designed to benchmark federated learning algorithms in a realistic setting.
dcterms:title: Federated Extended MNIST
